thread.title: BRIEF-BMW Of North America LLC Says In Total, BMW Group In U.S. Reported March Sales Of 35,842 Vehicles, Down 0.4 Percent

title: BRIEF-BMW Of North America LLC Says In Total, BMW Group In U.S. Reported March Sales Of 35,842 Vehicles, Down 0.4 Percent

organizations.name: brief-bmw of north america llc says in total

text:
Market News April 3, 2018 / 4:41 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-BMW Of North America LLC Says In Total, BMW Group In U.S. Reported March Sales Of 35,842 Vehicles, Down 0.4 Percent Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 3 (Reuters) - BMW of North America LLC: 
* IN TOTAL, BMW GROUP IN U.S. (BMW AND MINI COMBINED) REPORTED MARCH SALES OF 35,842 VEHICLES, A DECREASE OF 0.4 PERCENT Source text : [ bit.ly/2q21622 ] Further company coverage:
